summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of Fauntleroy Avenue, from West Edmunds Street to California Avenue and from West Willow Street to West Fontanelle Street and from West Webster Street to Wildwood Place, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving, constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 5835, and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof.
